Contributor: Godwin, Frank, 1889- artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "Frank Godwin." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a magazine and newspaper advertisement for an unspecified Liberty Loan campaign.  The text says that on this day which is the anniversary of Liberty Day, seven score years ago, America will find out who are men, and who are not. Each man must do his full share. Illustration shows a figure of a woman standing in front of a flag with outstretched hands.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Today is the day of test!
